oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Lewis Bible
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1727 Welsh Bible of John Lewis, containing family entries. Family entries scanned May 2018. One page missing from entries at time of receipt. Bible now has cloth cover (not original). The Bible was given in memory of Col. Lew Wallace Lewis.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bibles; Families;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
